pair.title: Adding Everything Presence One
pair.description: Make sure your Everything Presence One is flashed with the ESPHome firmware, powered on and on the same Wi-Fi network as Homey Pro. For instructions on how to flash click the button below.

error.unavailable: Could not connect, make sure the device is powered on.
error.unavailable_encrypted: Could not connect, disable encryption on your device.
error.connect_timeout: Connect timeout, make sure the device is powered on.
